SELECT RNUM, R_NO ,R_CH_NO ,R_TARGET_UNO, R_DATE ,R_TYPE ,R_ALARM_YN ,M_ID,M_NICKNAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, R_NO ,R_CH_NO ,R_TARGET_UNO, R_DATE ,R_TYPE ,R_ALARM_YN ,M_ID,M_NICKNAME FROM( SELECT R_NO ,R_CH_NO ,R_TARGET_UNO, R_DATE ,R_TYPE ,R_ALARM_YN FROM RELATION JOIN CHANNEL ON(R_CH_NO=CH_NO) WHERE R_TYPE='SUBSCRIBE' AND R_CH_NO=#{chNo} ORDER BY R_NO DESC) JOIN MEMBER ON(R_TARGET_UNO=M_UNO) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{current} AND #{limit}
